REALDOCS:
Welcome to the RealDocs Bot!
I can help you do a Quick Check of your property. %[Quick Check](postback:quick_check)
QUICK CHECK: Great! Click the following button to get started. %[Get Started](postback:get_started)
GET STARTED: What is the status of this property? %[Ready to Occupy](postback:ready_to_occupy) %[Under Construction](postback:under_construction) %[Not Started](postback:not_started)
READY TO OCCUPY: How many floors does this property have? %[More than 3](postback:more_than_3) %[Equal/Less than 3](postback:equalless_than_3)
UNDER CONSTRUCTION: How many floors does this property have? %[Greater than 3](postback:greater_than_3) %[Less/Equal to 3](postback:lessequal_to_3)
NOT STARTED: How many floors does this property have? %[Greater than 3](postback:greater_than_3) %[Less than or equal to 3](postback:lessequal_to_3)
MORE THAN 3: Is there an Occupancy Certificate for this unit? %[Yes there is](postback:oc_yes) %[No there is not](postback:oc_no)
EQUAL/LESS THAN 3: Is there a Sanctioned Building Plan? %[SBP is available](postback:sbp_yes) %[No SBP](postback:sbp_no)
YES THERE IS:
The property is safe to consider.
Would you like to check another property? %[Quick Check](postback:quick_check) %[Thanks I'm Done](postback:thanks_done)
IN PROGRESS:
We recommend you wait till the documents are available.
Would you like to check another property? %[Quick Check](postback:quick_check) %[Thanks I'm Done](postback:thanks_done)
NO THERE IS NOT:
This is an illegal construction. We recommend not considering this property.
Would you like to check another property? %[Quick Check](postback:quick_check) %[Thanks I'm Done](postback:thanks_done)
GREATER THAN 3: Is there a Commencement Certificate? %[Yes Absolutely](postback:cc_yes) %[No CC AVAILABLE](postback:cc_no)
LESS/EQUAL TO 3: Is there a Sanctioned Building Plan? %[SBP is available](postback:sbp_yes) %[No SBP](postback:sbp_no) %[SBP in progress](postback:sbp_inprogress)
YES ABSOLUTELY: Is there a Sanctioned Building Plan? %[SBP is available](postback:sbp_yes) %[No SBP](postback:sbp_no) %[SBP in progress](postback:sbp_inprogress)
NO CC AVAILABLE:
This is an illegal construction. We recommend not considering this property.
Would you like to check another property? %[Quick Check](postback:quick_check)
SBP IS AVAILABLE: Is the floor and tower of the apartment you are considering listed on the Sanctioned Building Plan? %[Yes it is](postback:yes_sbp) %[No it is not](postback:no_sbp)
NO SBP:
This is an illegal construction. We recommend not considering this property.
Would you like to check another property? %[Quick Check](postback:quick_check)
SBP IN PROGRESS:
We recommend you wait till the documents are available.
Would you like to check another property? %[Quick Check](postback:quick_check)
YES IT IS:
The property is safe to consider.
Would you like to check another property? %[Quick Check](postback:quick_check)
NO IT IS NOT:
This is an illegal construction. We recommend not considering this property.
Would you like to check another property? %[Quick Check](postback:quick_check)
